scripts.gen-daily: bun run gen-daily-v2 && bun run gen-daily-v1
scripts.gen-derived: bun run gen-summaries && bun run gen-csv
scripts.gen-summaries: bun run scripts/data/v2/summary.ts && bun run scripts/data/v1/summary.ts
scripts.gen-all: bun run gen-daily && bun run gen-daily-v1 && bun run gen-killed && bun run gen-killed-v1 && bun run gen-derived
scripts.flightcheck: bun run types && bun run reset-manifest && bun run gen-all && bun run docs-build && bun run docs-serve
scripts.docs-build: ./scripts/build/pre-build.sh && cd site && bun run build && cd .. && ./scripts/build/pre-deploy.sh
scripts.types: tsc --noEmit && cd site && bun run typecheck
